title: How lung tissue forms immune cell hubs in times of need

title_detail.value: How lung tissue forms immune cell hubs in times of need

summary: Research uncovers how lung tissue is remodelled to support an immune response to influenza. The findings hold promise for broader immunisation against flu and the development of new therapeutic strategies for autoimmune diseases.

summary_detail.value: Research uncovers how lung tissue is remodelled to support an immune response to influenza. The findings hold promise for broader immunisation against flu and the development of new therapeutic strategies for autoimmune diseases.
